birth_place.zh-cn: 湖南省湘西土家族苗族自治州古丈县岩头寨镇

description.zh-cn: 中国苗族女歌唱家，曾任中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团团长、中国音乐家协会副主席。
description.en: A Chinese Miao female singer, former head of the Song and Dance Troupe of the Political Work Department of the People's Liberation Army Navy, and former vice-chairman of the Chinese Musicians' Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国电视制片人，宋祖英的丈夫。
description.en: Chinese television producer, husband of Song Zuying.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，宋祖英的妹妹。
description.en: Chinese actress, younger sister of Song Zuying.

description.zh-cn: 美术工作者，宋祖英的弟弟。
description.en: Art worker, younger brother of Song Zuying.

location.zh-cn: 湖南省湘西土家族苗族自治州

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Song Zuying.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的音乐学院，宋祖英的母校。
description.en: A music conservatory in Beijing, China, and the alma mater of Song Zuying.

description.zh-cn: 中国音乐家的全国性组织。
description.en: A national organization for musicians in China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军的文艺团体。
description.en: The cultural troupe of the People's Liberation Army Navy of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第九届全国人民代表大会的代表身份。
description.en: The status of a deputy to the 9th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的委员身份。
description.en: The status of a member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国声乐教育家，宋祖英的老师。
description.en: Chinese vocal educator, teacher of Song Zuying.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙男高音歌唱家。
description.en: Spanish operatic tenor.

description.zh-cn: 第29届夏季奥林匹克运动会。
description.en: The 29th Summer Olympic Games.

description.zh-cn: 2010年世界博览会。
description.en: The 2010 World Expo.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员、导演、歌手。
description.en: Hong Kong actor, director, and singer.

description.zh-cn: 台湾男歌手、音乐人、演员。
description.en: Taiwanese male singer, musician, and actor.

description.zh-cn: 台湾男歌手、音乐人、演员、导演。
description.en: Taiwanese male singer, musician, actor, and director.

description.zh-cn: 中国电视节目主持人、媒体人、企业家。
description.en: Chinese television host, media personality, and entrepreneur.

description.zh-cn: 河南濮阳胡村乡政府科级干部，因在演出中强行搂抱宋祖英而被行政拘留。
description.en: A section-level cadre from the government of Hucun Township, Puyang, Henan, who was administratively detained for forcibly embracing Song Zuying during a performance.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英于1992年与罗浩结婚。
description.en: Song Zuying married Luo Hao in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 宋佳玲是宋祖英的妹妹。
description.en: Song Jialing is Song Zuying's younger sister.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖荣是宋祖英的弟弟。
description.en: Song Zurong is Song Zuying's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英出生于湖南省古丈县。
description.en: Song Zuying was born in Guzhang County, Hunan Province.

degree.zh-cn: 民族声乐专业毕业，艺术学博士学位
degree.en: Graduated in Ethnic Vocal Music, Doctor of Arts degree

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英毕业于中国音乐学院民族声乐专业，并获得艺术学博士学位。
description.en: Song Zuying graduated from the China Conservatory of Music with a major in Ethnic Vocal Music and holds a Doctor of Arts degree.

description.zh-cn: 1988年10月，金铁霖在“金龙杯”全国歌手邀请赛后收宋祖英为学生，对其声乐事业产生了重要影响。
description.en: In October 1988, after the 'Golden Dragon Cup' National Singer Invitational Competition, Jin Tielin accepted Song Zuying as his student, significantly influencing her vocal career.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英于1999年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Song Zuying joined the Communist Party of China in 1999.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团

description.zh-cn: 2013年至2018年，宋祖英担任海政文工团团长。
description.en: From 2013 to 2018, Song Zuying served as the head of the PLA Navy Political Work Department Song and Dance Troupe.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英曾任中国音乐家协会副主席。
description.en: Song Zuying served as the Vice Chairman of the Chinese Musicians' Association.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英曾任第九届全国人大代表。
description.en: Song Zuying was a deputy to the 9th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英曾任第十届、十一届、十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: Song Zuying served as a member of the 10th, 11th, and 12th National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在北京奥运会闭幕式上与多明哥共同演唱了主题歌《爱的火焰》。
description.en: Co-performed the theme song 'The Flame of Love' with Plácido Domingo at the closing ceremony of the Beijing Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 在上海世博会开幕式上与成龙共同演唱歌曲。
description.en: Co-performed a song with Jackie Chan at the opening ceremony of the Shanghai Expo.

description.zh-cn: 在2011台北小巨蛋个人演唱会上与周华健同台演出。
description.en: Performed on the same stage with Wakin Chau at her 2011 solo concert at the Taipei Arena.

description.zh-cn: 在2011台北小巨蛋个人演唱会上与周杰伦同台演出。
description.en: Performed on the same stage with Jay Chou at her 2011 solo concert at the Taipei Arena.

description.zh-cn: 在河南濮阳的演出活动中，王留聚突然上台强行搂抱宋祖英，扰乱了演出秩序，导致其提前结束演唱。
description.en: During a performance in Puyang, Henan, Wang Liuju suddenly went on stage and forcibly embraced Song Zuying, disrupting the performance and causing her to end her singing prematurely.

description.zh-cn: 2007年，宋祖英接受杨澜《天下女人》节目的访问。
description.en: In 2007, Song Zuying was interviewed by Yang Lan on the program 'Her Village'.
